--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> Tyrael: Oh, but the Tripredacus suit me very well.
> Do not doubt that 
> wherever you look, Shadow Star, you shall see

> weapon, an enemy, 
> everything has a use. It is up to those like you and
> me to discover 
> it.
